author: crossley
msg: Removing old sitemap grammar in favour of the new one that also has
some embedded Schematron rules (which are not yet used by Forrest).

author: crossley
msg: Keep in sync with Cocoon changes to sitemap RNG.

author: jefft
msg: Updated sitemap schema to handle new sourcetype tags. Thanks to Bruno Dumon

author: stevenn
msg: Changed processing of HowTo's - thanks to Bruno Dumon - bruno@outerthought.org
The way howto's are now processed is now configured by the SourceTypeAction. This also means
howto's can now appear at any place in the URI namespace. XML-based Content Aware Pipelines,
brought to you by Bruno, and obediently committed by private Steven.
